Description: Hieratic papyrus with a Late Egyptian Miscellany recto cols 9-11: 8.7-9.4 'The pupil will build his teacher a castle'; 9.4-10.1 'Hardships of the soldier's life'; 10.1-5 'Prayer to Amun in a year of need'; 10.5-8 'Prayer to Amun to favour the scribe'; 10.8-11.8 'A royal order of warning and instruction'.; 11.8-12.5 'Rebuke to a dissipated scribe'. Late Egyptian Miscellanies
Curator's comments: Miscellany Gardiner Late Egyptian Miscellanies pp. Caminos Late Egyptian Miscellanies pp. Vernus, RdE 37, p. 144-145 [11, 4].
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (380655) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/380655)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: cockled, loss Black ink Red ink Backed: brown paper Checked for loan to Paris 2005 Mount Details: Sandwich: glass (warped) Window verso Binding: leather (deteriorated) Object Priority: B Mount Priority: C Overall Condition: B
